name: 90s Dystopia
description:
Your mind is locked in dystopian world wide web from an alternative early 90s. Now, you must pinball your way through it to break your chains!

With your hard earned credits, you will be able to buy new balls for the pinball and break your chains as well. Beware, however, for you must pay an upkeep cost to continue your hacking journey.

Controls:

  • Left and right arrow keys: activate the flippers.
  • Keyboard numbers: choose options from the computer menu.

This game was made in the last day of the LostRelicGames jam. Thanks for the everyone tag at Discord, John!

This game uses the following free assets. A big thank you to all those creators!

  • Desk: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/furniture/pbr-game-ready-desks-pa...
  • Lamp: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/electronics/old-ussr-lamp-110400#...
  • Keyboard: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/electronics/keyboard-adjustable-c...
  • TVs: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/electronics/tv-set-26193#descript...
  • SFXs: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/arcade-sfx-free-42983#descr...
  • Music: https://opengameart.org/content/cpu-showdown
